## ButtonOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ButtonOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attribs](./hdom-components.buttonopts.attribs.md) | <code>any</code> | Attribute object to use for enabled buttons. Default: none |
|  [attribsDisabled](./hdom-components.buttonopts.attribsdisabled.md) | <code>any</code> | Attribute object to use for disabled buttons. Default: none |
|  [preventDefault](./hdom-components.buttonopts.preventdefault.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Flag to indicate if user supplied <code>onclick</code> handler should be wrapped in a function which automatically calls <code>preventDefault()</code>. Default: true |
|  [tag](./hdom-components.buttonopts.tag.md) | <code>string</code> | Element name to use for enabled buttons. Default: "a" |
|  [tagDisabled](./hdom-components.buttonopts.tagdisabled.md) | <code>string</code> | Element name to use for disabled buttons. Default: "span" |
